definitions.text:
Piety; belief God, and reverence for his character and laws.
1. A religious life; a careful observance of the laws of and performance of religious duties, proceeding from love and reverence for the divine character and commands; christian obedience. is profitable unto all things. 1 Timothy 4:7.
2. Revelation; the system of christianity. Without controversy, great is the mystery of godliness; was manifest the flesh. Tim.
